title: Beautiful 2/1.1 apartment
posting_body: ['Beautiful apartment, 2 bedrooms, 1.5 baths, very spacious, title floors, light & bright condo, New stainless steel appliances(refrigerator, microwave, electric range, dishwasher, fresh painted throughout, ready to move in.', 'Great location, walking distance to casino, shops and restaurants, 10 minutes away from Hallandale Beach.', '1 Parking space assigned, Washer and Dryer facilities on the building.', '705 NE 2nd', 'St # 16  HALLANDALE BEACH, FL 33009-3574', 'PROPERTY ID:  GTA11241664', 'Type of Property: apt', 'List Price:\t$2,300', 'Bedrooms:  2', 'Bathrooms: 1.5', 'SqFt (Liv):¤834', 'CALL OR TEXT TODAY', 'show contact info', 'Global Trust Realty, LLC posts properties for a 30 day period of time.', ' Due to current high rental demand, some properties advertised may be withdrawn, cancelled, rented, pending or sold within the past 30 days.', ' All prices are subject to change based upon availability.', 'All information is deemed to be correct but not guaranteed.', 'Listed and Brokered by:BM2 Realty']
